column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Jessica - Thank you for the awesome review. I'm glad you enjoy our ramen
column2: especially its nurturing properties as you have pointed out! I will say there is plenty of anecdotal evidence that a hot bowl of ramen can "perk up" a slightly inebriated person (I won't say "sober up" because only time can do that). But thank you again for the kind words
column3: and we look forward to serving you again soon.
